scraping.description: Number of parallel workers (10 = optimized for i5-14600KF)
scraping.description_patch: Patch version to scrape ('14' = rolling 14-day window, or specific like '15.1')
scraping.description_pool: Which champion pool to scrape (SOLOQ_POOL, ALL_CHAMPIONS, or custom list)
scraping.description_timeout: Maximum execution time before script is killed (30min = safety margin for 12min execution)

logging.description_size: Maximum log file size before rotation (0 = no limit)

patch_detection.description_force: Always update even if no new patch (useful for rolling window '14')
patch_detection.description_cache: File to store last known patch version

advanced.description_priority: Process priority (IDLE, BELOW_NORMAL, NORMAL, ABOVE_NORMAL, HIGH)
advanced.description_cleanup: Delete old matchup data before importing (WARNING: data loss if script fails)
advanced.description_scores: Recalculate tier list scores after scraping
